name: pnp-list-all-files-specific-name
title: List all documents with a specific name within a SharePoint site
shortDescription: This script will retrieve all the files in a site that have a specific word.
longDescription: This script will retrieve all the files in a site that have a specific word (i.e.: search all documents where the word 'CLI' is part of the file name).

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
